reviews.review: great game way better than new cod mw, 10/10 devs actually played the game before release and theres no bugs. game of the century.

Even better than the first one! Portal 2 is a wild ride. Puzzles are actually challenging, the story is crazy and interesting. Different from anything I've ever played. I definitely recommend playing portal 1 first to get familiar with the series overall plot. Near perfect puzzle action adventure 9/10
One of the greatest games ever made, and one of the best co-op experiences as well.
puzzlenya mantap, bisa ngetroll temen pulak, keren ini game
Now you might be wondering why I have 140 hours. good question.
You play as a girl that uses a gun that doesn't kill people, like the first game, but there's no diabetic treats to be seen or heard of. The writing is hit-or-miss, otherwise, it's okay.
This game is a must-own. I suggest you play the first Portal game first to fully understand most of what happens in this one.
This game is a true masterpiece, and I don't use the word 'masterpiece' very lightly.

What an amazing physics based puzzle game. This is one of the first games I ever bought, I enjoyed it thouroughly, the single player content was quite intriguing and the multiplayer content is good for hours of fun with friends.

10/10

The best part IMO is the online co-op. I made so many friends through it.

Portal 2 is a great game in my opinion it provided me a fun and challenging time and in fact i love how this game is a simple concept of shooting portals but yet it's so fun and addictive when you solve a puzzle in the game ill have to say that this game is by far one of the best puzzle games that you can buy right now in my opinion.

GAMEPLAY 
So you may be thinking how does the game feel i'd say the games controls and everything about the gameplay mechanics are solid they feel natural and not once did i feel as if the controls were clunky now i used only a keyboard and mouse so i can't speak about using a controller but im pretty sure the controller would aswell however i cant confirm that.

GRAPHICS 
Now the graphics are pretty good and they aren't terrible at all infact they still hold up in my opinion sometimes the game can depending on the lighting effetcs look almost like a next gen game and it looks amazing now of course the graphics art style isn't suppose to look 100% realistic since from my experince some models kinda look like cartoon models but it never takes you out of the experince just a small thing i noticed 

Conclussion
So now what? should you buy this game well i'd say yes go ahead and pick this game up however i'd only reccomend you get this game during a sale since the game can be very short if you know how to beat most of the puzzles but if you havce never played a portal game before then idk maybe buy it when it's not on sale from my experince 99 cents was very much a good deal for this short but challenging game i give portal 2 9/10 üêæ

Portal 2 is honestly one of those games that keeps you coming back years later. I remember getting this on my PS3 when it first came out and I actually got my old Steam account back just to play this game. Its a great way to test your thinking by yourself or with a friend.
This puzzle game keep you on edge throughout the whole game session. It's atmosphere of solitude is a great factor and immerses you into the after-math of Aperture Science perfectly.
